table_description: GitHub Workflows bundle project files for download by users.

columns.name: repository_full_name
columns.description: Full name of the repository that contains the workflow.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Time when the workflow was created.

columns.name: node_id
columns.description: Node where GitHub stores this data internally.

columns.name: updated_at
columns.description: Time when the workflow was updated.

columns.name: workflow_file_content
columns.description: Content of github workflow file in text format.

columns.name: workflow_file_content_json
columns.description: Content of github workflow file in the JSON format.

columns.name: pipeline
columns.description: Github workflow in the generic pipeline entity format to be used across CI/CD platforms.
